local_intent: Execute the contact-based placement: perceive red plate, approach above it, lower until contact, verify contact, press/place, open gripper to release, retreat and wait.
assumptions: The robot currently holds the white plate with a stable grasp
The blackboard key 'place_pose' is set (red_plate_center) and valid
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT 'place' phase following LowerUntilContact -> ContactDetected -> PlaceAt -> OpenGripper -> Retreat -> Wait, using the same parameter choices.
